add_curr_website.message: Add current website to the list.

advertising_category_desc.message: Advertising trackers are used to analyze website traffic, user behavior, or site visitors' patterns.

advertising_category_tooltip.message: Trackers that analyze website traffic or usage behavior.

analytics_category_desc.message: Site Analytics trackers are used to gather data regarding webpage usage.

analytics_category_tooltip.message: Relates to data analytics and webpage usage trackers.

app_desc.message: Protects your privacy by blocking trackers that collect different type of data everytime you navigate online.

browser_not_installed.message: This browser isn't installed on your device

browser_session_blocked.message: trackers blocked in the current browsing session

cookies_category_desc.message: Third-party cookies are used by advertisers to monitor online activity across websites for behavioral targeting.

cookies_category_tooltip.message: Stores information to identify your behavior across websites.

enable_app.message: Enable Bitdefender Anti-tracker to stop websites trackers

essential_category_desc.message: Essential trackers are used to monitor critical webpage functionalities.

essential_category_tooltip.message: Relates to trackers that are critical for webpage functionality.

exception_action_desc.message: Manually add or remove websites below

exceptions_desc.message: Trackers on excepted websites will not be blocked.

interaction_category_desc.message: Customer Interaction trackers are used to measure user interaction with different input forms such as chat or support.

interaction_category_tooltip.message: Trackers used to measure interaction with forms such as chat or support.

plugins_title.message: You can use Anti-tracker with the following apps

policy_accept_click_agree.message: Click 'Agree' to use Bitdefender Anti-Tracker according to the {0}Privacy Policy{1}.

policy_accept_data_settings.message: Settings and exceptions you configure in the extension

policy_accept_explain.message: Bitdefender Anti-tracker collects anonymous data to block trackers, increase browsing performance and improve your experience. This data includes:

policy_accept_gree.message: Agree to use Bitdefender Anti-Tracker according to the {0}Privacy Policy{1}.

policy_accept_open.message: Open Bitdefender Anti-tracker that is located under the extension icon {0} in the top-right corner of the toolbar.

policy_accepted_click_reload.message: Click 'Reload and Activate' to start using the extension.

policy_title.message: Enable Bitdefender Anti-tracker to get started

social_category_desc.message: Social Media trackers are used to monitor social audience, activity and user engagement with different social media platforms.

social_category_tooltip.message: Trackers used to measure engagement with different social media platforms.

special_offers_tooltip.message: We use commercial trackers to help you find our special offers easily. Our mission is to protect your privacy. We never share any of the information collected with anybody, for any purpose.

tooltip.message: Blocks web trackers from collecting data that would enable user profiling and commercial targeting.
